name: Julius BARBOUR, et al., Petitioners, v. HALLIBURTON COMPANY, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Julius BARBOUR, et al., Petitioners,
v.
HALLIBURTON COMPANY, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Patrick A. Juneau, in His Capacity as New Class Claims Administrator of the Punitive Damages Settlement Program for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Julius BARBOUR, et al., Petitioners,
v.
HALLIBURTON COMPANY, et al.
No. 19-739.
Supreme Court of the United States.
April 20, 2020
Motion of Patrick A. Juneau, in His Capacity as New Class Claims Administrator of the Punitive Damages Settlement Program for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
